title: The Case of Her Broken Stomach Hub
content:

[[div style="font-family:P22 Corinthia;"]]
[[=]]
+ The Case of Her Broken Stomach
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote" style="border-radius: 10px; margin: 10px"]]

[[=]]
//How often have I said to you that when you have eliminated the impossible whatever remains, HOWEVER IMPROBABLE, must be the truth?//
[[/=]]

[[=]]
- Arthur Conan Doyle, The Complete Sherlock Holmes
[[/=]]

[[/div]]

[[=]]
++ Act I
[[/=]]

[[=]]
+++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8712 SCP-8712 - The Broken Stomach]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
//"Ever the optimist you are, Watson. I do at times envy your simplicity."//
[[/=]]

[[=]]
++++ [[*user zoempaws]]
[[/=]]

------

++ Act II
[[/=]]

[[=]]
+++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-cogwork-cult The Cogwork Cult]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
//"Moriarty's corpse is to be hung from the rafters."//
[[/=]]

[[=]]
++++ [[*user cptsquid]]
[[/=]]

------

[[=]]
++ Act III
[[/=]]

[[=]]
+++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-turn-of-the-century The Turn of the Century]
[[/=]]

//"If this is how I shall die, then so be it."//
[[/=]]

[[=]]
++++ [[*user Shirley Sterling]]
